embed: <object width="640" height="390"><param name="movie" value="http://youtube.com/v/BDiEbi0yCY8?version=3&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://youtube.com/v/BDiEbi0yCY8?version=3&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="640" height="390" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>
summary:
We hope to have you among the participants of 2012! EuroPython is the official
European conference about the Python programming language. It is aimed at
everyone in the Python community, of all skill levels, both users and
programmers.
title: EuroPython 2012: Join us in Florence on July!
